page.title: 17EDUCATION IN BOW SCHOOL
page.content: TEACHERS Headmaster Mr M Palmer,Deputy Headmaster Mr C Searle, Mrs R. Keenan and Mrs D Woodward.Secretary Mrs Quick Caretaker Mrs Hobbs,Cook Mrs Born Assistant cook Mrs Oakes,Dinner and playground Supervisors Mrs Leach and Mrs Yelland.The present school building was built in 1881.There are at present 77 pupils. The large playing field is 200 metres from the school and has a football pitch, hard surface netball court and adventure play equipment.The school swimming pool is opposite the school.There is a small garden with pond and tree nursery.Every year the Parent Staff Association run a Christmas and Summer Fayre to raise money for the school Fund.A Harvest Festival is held each year.At Christmas a play is produced and a Carol Service held at the Church
